mineBlock.title: Welcome to POW!
mineBlock.description:
Your mission? Mine blocks to grow your chain, earn rewards, and unlock new powers. 
Start clicking to mine your first block!

purchaseTransactions.title: Unlock a Transaction
purchaseTransactions.description:
Click the transaction to unlock it — that's how you include it in a block. 
Transactions fuel your blockchain… and your profits!

addTransactionsToBlock.title: Transaction ready!
addTransactionsToBlock.description:
You can only mine a block once it's full of transactions.
Add transactions until your block is packed and ready.
Then hit mine to seal it and earn your reward!

checkStore.title: Visit the Shop
checkStore.description:
Let's spend those rewards!
Head to the Shop to unlock new transaction types, activate automation, and buy powerful upgrades. 
Every purchase boosts your blockchain!

purchaseFeeUpgrade.title: Boost Transaction Value
purchaseFeeUpgrade.description:
Each transaction you process earns you rewards.
Click the value upgrade to increase how much each one is worth.
The higher the value, the faster your earnings stack up!

purchaseSpeedUpgrade.title: Automate and Accelerate Transaction
purchaseSpeedUpgrade.description:
This upgrade automates your transactions — no need to click each one!
Upgrade again to increase how fast they're added to your block.

L2Upgrade.title: Congrats! You now have an L2
L2Upgrade.description:
You've just unlocked a Layer 2 — a faster, cheaper way to scale your blockchain.
Click here to manage it and boost your chain's performance.

dataAvailability.title: Congrats! You now have a data availability layer
dataAvailability.description: Click here to manage the data availability layer.

prover.title: Congrats! You now have a prover
prover.description: Click here to manage the prover.
